packages.hotel_description: Among Cairo hotels, Steigenberger El Tahrir secures a spectacular location in El Tahrir Square, overlooking the Egyptian museum, minutes away from Khan El Khalili Bazar, and in close proximity to...

product_specs.specification_value: El Tahrir Square, overlooking the Egyptian museum
Minutes away from Khan El Khalili Bazar

agent_recommendation_notes: Spectacular location in El Tahrir Square
The hotel rooftop has a great view of the pyramids, and we enjoyed having a delicious dinner while watching the light show.
One of our rooms also had a view!
We really appreciated all the cold free drinking water too.
